items.title: 'Nancy blunder evidence of Celtic's blurred vision'
items.description: There is "no apparent big picture view at Celtic", argues BBC Sport Scotland's Tom English as Wilfried Nancy and Paul Tisdale exit the ailing champion...

items.title: Claire's and The Original Factory Shop to enter administration
items.description: The firms' owner said "alarming" low Christmas trading left both in a "vulnerable" position

items.title: Stop experiments and get manager who fits Man Utd DNA - Neville
items.description: Gary Neville urges Manchester United to 'stop experimenting' and appoint a manager who fits the club's DNA after Ruben Amorim was sacked on Monday.

items.title: 'I'm a prisoner of war' - In the room for Maduro's dramatic court hearing
items.description: During the 40-minute arraignment, Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores, pleaded not guilty to drugs and weapon charges.

items.title: O'Neill returns to Celtic for rest of season after Nancy sacked
items.description: Martin O'Neill is returning to Celtic as manager for the remainder of the season following the dismissal of Wilfried Nancy.
